snippet: A Dark Room, a video game, pulls players in despite a lack of bells and whistles.
abstract: Stephen Totilo Critic's Notebook observes that video game A Dark Room, refreshingly minimalist in its design, offers more to users by offering less.
lead_paragraph: A Dark Room, a video game, pulls players in despite a lack of bells and whistles.

headline.print_headline: To a Gamer, Minimalism Is a Virtue
headline.main: To a Gamer, Minimalism Is a Virtue
